flawed_nl_solution:
Maria has $120 and received $250 from her mother. So she has 120 + 250 = $<<120+250=350>>350.
As the price of the bike stands at $600, Maria needs 600 – 350 = $<<600-350=250>>250 more to buy the bike.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 370, not 350. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
